answers.answer: Try making everything into icy. Um also really tap into your pregnancy, see what baby wants and craves. Try and eat bit by bit. Your appetite will come back. Good luck. I don't miss that stage, n that's all out is, a stage.
Try applesauce, broth, toast. Anything that usually helps when you're sick with the flu. Popsicles can be great because they're wet and fruity. Good luck hopefully it passes quickly!
Love it's hard. For me it lasted longer than the first three months. I lived on chicken noodle soup and g2 gatorade..The regular has to much sugar. Don't want diabetes.
Thanks soo much ladies I hope it passes too I pretty much work full time &' its sooo.hard to concentrate on an empty stomach /: I will try all suggestions thanks again (:

question: Im constantly feeling sick &' any type of food disgusts me! What can I eat or do to at least ease it up a bit?In tired of feeling hungry all the time /:
title: O M G
